wijaya jayasuriya  oba yana sati bala sitimi hamada midulata wa udeta hari nawatha nanga - obema sinawa muwata thaba yanakota dahiriyawawanna bari tharamata baluna mata ma desama ibeta duppathkamayi - sahathika godakuyiaran oba aawa thula siritha gana nosithama kalekin kisiwaku nawa thotamunaka bala unnuma ekka inna chanda marutha mada - napuru diyawal pada ahumuluwalin mathuwena thawamath parana walawkarakam mage hinawalata wadda nogenahama pandarakama - obath ekka awadi wennam kaluwata giya ahasaka tharu thalwathin maga soya gaththak menshantha katukurundawathurane mage mithurana bili pithi karapinnana asammatha bada rassawa eeth hitha honda gobilanamaranayak mangulak game thibena wita hinda pasu bime adi dara diya thun yame thuthi noladdath pasasumeoowite madira pera kasiyak gaththath gara sora sithak waradak nura nokala bawa atha nam darajayarathna gamage  pasale wada nimayi amma thawama natha beli gase sewana yata podi deneth manga balaguruwarun lamun sama pitawa gos thaniwela gaha kola da katha natha hudakala raja welagini gahana maddahane hisa da kakiyana wele thibaha badaginna mada podi doni thaniwelamigasaare gunapala wikramaaarachchibinda neda pingan pirisi wagema hadawathath  en.
